info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 4:00PM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of greater than 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Herkimer County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM to 7 PM EST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Untreated ground surfaces will be treacherous due to ice. The heaviest Lake Effect snowband should remain just north of the Thruway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
